accueil.introduction: This application will allow you to manage your Puyfolais activity within the association.
accueil.start: To get started, please log in by clicking on the icon in the top right corner.

sign.emailEnvoye: An email has been sent to {{mail}} with a link to reset your password.
sign.validationInscription: Your registration was successful! You are now logged in. However, no profile has been assigned to you yet. Please wait for an administrator to assign these profiles to use the application.

identifiants.invalides: The provided credentials are invalid. Please try again.
identifiants.existants: This email is already in use, please use your associated credentials to log in.

admin.introduction: Here you can access the application settings (user, structure, options ...).

utilisateurs.introduction: Here you can manage the application users.

structures.introduction: Here you can manage the association's structures.

saisons.introduction: Here you can manage the seasons.
saisons.blocageSuppression: You cannot delete seasons with existing sessions.

edition.messageDatesErronees: Start date is greater than end date.
edition.messageModificationPlageAvecSeanceExista: The new date range does not include all currently defined sessions. Please modify the dates or adjust the sessions.

seances.aucuneSeance: No sessions defined, please add one using the calendar
